thread.title: New "Bachelor" Season Will Feature Returning Contestants, TWINS
thread.title_full: New "Bachelor" Season Will Feature Returning Contestants, TWINS

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: New "Bachelor" Season Will Feature Returning Contestants, TWINS
text:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail ABC / Fred Lee Advertisement - Continue Reading Below ABC confirmed last month that Ben "Hottie McDimplepants" Higgins would be the twentie th nineteenth lucky guy (there have been twenty seasons, but Brad Womack landed the leading man's spot twice) to front the long-running Bachelor franchise. Filming on his season and the romance sure to ensue is currently underway, and some of the lucky ladies in the running for his roses have already been identified.
More From Cosmopolitan There are two returning contestants: Becca Tilley and Amber James are in the mix, Us Weekly reports ; the pair previously appeared on Chris Soules's series (and, in Amber's case, the last season of Bachelor in Paradise) and are back in back-to-back seasons, presumably because they watched Kaitlyn's turn as The Bachelorette in turn also and, you know, saw Ben on screen. That's all it takes — case in point, Becca's tweet on the subject proving she's serious:
Ben H is what most 26 yr old virgins named Becca are looking for.
— Becca Tilley (@beccatilley5) August 25, 2015
You can bet it wasn't long at all after the show's producers saw this tweet that they got in touch. Reality Steve, who first reported both Becca and Amber's casting, also says there's a pair of identical twins, Vegas cocktail waitress identical twins, in the cast. In other words, look forward to triplets (possibly conjoined triplets?) on the second season of UnREAL .
Follow Alex on Twitter . ​
